West_Des_Moines.Burnstein-Malin Grocery: The Burnstein-Malin Grocery, also known as the Malin's Kosher Delicatessen, Pickle Barrel Delicatessen, and The Pickle Barrel, is a historic building located in Des Moines, Iowa, United States. This commercial building was constructed in two parts. The first part is a 2½-story frame house built back from Sixth Avenue for Frank W. Whitcomb in 1896.
